item.title: Probability & Statistics (Monsoon 2020)
item.description: A first course in probability and statistics with a focus on discrete spaces.

item.title: Advanced Mathematical Structures
item.description: This course is intended to familiarize the students with the types of mathematical reasoning found in theoretical research on computing and communications. The course contains a broad set of intermediate and advanced level topics in Algebra, Combinatorics, Probability and Graph Theory.

item.title: Probability & Statistics
item.description: A first undergraduate course in probability and statistics with a focus on discrete spaces.
